languages.text: {n}Маражай подцепляет когтем перчатки одну из смятых пластин доспеха на бедре и придирчиво ее осматривает.{/n} "Когда момент нашей встречи настанет — а он настанет, даже если мне придется выпотрошить всю Комморру — и если при этом ты будешь рядом, я желаю, чтобы ты не вздумал{mf||а} наносить последний удар. Только Эзирраеш имеет право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш — и это право мое".

{n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай подцепляет когтем перчатки одну из смятых пластин доспеха на бедре и придирчиво ее осматривает.{/n} "Когда момент нашей встречи настанет — а он настанет, даже если мне придется выпотрошить всю Комморру — и если при этом ты будешь рядом, я желаю, чтобы ты не вздумал{mf||а} наносить последний удар. Только Эзирраеш имеет право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш — и это право мое".

Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手套上的利爪，勾住了大腿上被打破的护甲板，仔细检查起来。{/n}“到了最后，我们一定会见面的。哪怕我要把整个科摩罗的人都开膛破肚，我也不会手软。等我们见面的时候，我一定会亲手给她致命一击。如果你也在场，你最好不要插手。只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权夺走另一位艾泽拉什家族成员的性命，这是属于我的权利。”
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手套上的利爪，勾住了大腿上被打破的护甲板，仔细检查起来。{/n}“到了最后，我们一定会见面的。哪怕我要把整个科摩罗的人都开膛破肚，我也不会手软。等我们见面的时候，我一定会亲手给她致命一击。如果你也在场，你最好不要插手。只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权夺走另一位艾泽拉什家族成员的性命，这是属于我的权利。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、籠手の爪で砕けた防具のプレートをひとつ太ももに引っ掛けるとじっくり調べ上げる。{/n}「俺達が最終的に対峙するときは…たとえコモラフを壊滅せしめてでも互いにぶつかり合うだろうが…もしお前がその場にいるなら、トドメを与えようなど夢にも思うなよ。アエジレシュだけがアエジレシュの命を奪う権利を持つ…その権利は俺のものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、籠手の爪で砕けた防具のプレートをひとつ太ももに引っ掛けるとじっくり調べ上げる。{/n}「俺達が最終的に対峙するときは…たとえコモラフを壊滅せしめてでも互いにぶつかり合うだろうが…もしお前がその場にいるなら、トドメを与えようなど夢にも思うなよ。アエジレシュだけがアエジレシュの命を奪う権利を持つ…その権利は俺のものだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai utiliza la garra de su guantelete para separar una de las placas de blindaje rotas que le cubren el muslo y la examina meticulosamente.{/n} «Cuando nos enfrentemos por fin, y lo haremos aunque tenga que destripar a todos los habitantes de Commorragh para ello... si estás allí cuando pase, que no se te ocurra asestarle el golpe de gracia. Solo un Aezyrraesh tiene legítimo derecho a arrebatar la vida de otro Aezyrraesh; y ese derecho es mío».
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai utiliza la garra de su guantelete para separar una de las placas de blindaje rotas que le cubren el muslo y la examina meticulosamente.{/n} «Cuando nos enfrentemos por fin, y lo haremos aunque tenga que destripar a todos los habitantes de Commorragh para ello... si estás allí cuando pase, que no se te ocurra asestarle el golpe de gracia. Solo un Aezyrraesh tiene legítimo derecho a arrebatar la vida de otro Aezyrraesh; y ese derecho es mío».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}À l'aide de la griffe dont son gant est équipé, Marazhai se saisit d'une des plaques d'armure froissées posées sur sa cuisse et l'inspecte méticuleusement.{/n} « Quand l'heure de la confrontation finale sera venue, et elle viendra même s'il me faut pour cela étriper tous les habitants de Commorragh, si vous avez l'honneur d'être là pour y assister, ne songez même pas à lui asséner le coup de grâce. Seul un Aezyrraesh a le droit de tuer l'un des siens, et ce privilège me revient. »
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'aide de la griffe dont son gant est équipé, Marazhai se saisit d'une des plaques d'armure froissées posées sur sa cuisse et l'inspecte méticuleusement.{/n} « Quand l'heure de la confrontation finale sera venue, et elle viendra même s'il me faut pour cela étriper tous les habitants de Commorragh, si vous avez l'honneur d'être là pour y assister, ne songez même pas à lui asséner le coup de grâce. Seul un Aezyrraesh a le droit de tuer l'un des siens, et ce privilège me revient. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit der Klaue an seinem Handschuhs hakt Marazhai eine der zertrümmerten Panzerplatten an seinem Oberschenkel an und inspiziert sie gründlich.{/n} "Wenn wir uns irgendwann gegenüberstehen – und wir werden uns gegenüberstehen, selbst wenn ich dafür ganz Commorragh auf den Kopf stellen muss – und Ihr solltet dann in der Nähe sein, wagt es ja nicht, ihr den Todesschlag zu versetzen. Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben eines Aezyrraesh zu beenden – und dieses Recht gebührt mir."
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit der Klaue an seinem Handschuhs hakt Marazhai eine der zertrümmerten Panzerplatten an seinem Oberschenkel an und inspiziert sie gründlich.{/n} "Wenn wir uns irgendwann gegenüberstehen – und wir werden uns gegenüberstehen, selbst wenn ich dafür ganz Commorragh auf den Kopf stellen muss – und Ihr solltet dann in der Nähe sein, wagt es ja nicht, ihr den Todesschlag zu versetzen. Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben eines Aezyrraesh zu beenden – und dieses Recht gebührt mir."

languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, eldivenindeki pençenin yardımıyla ezilen zırh plakalarından birini kalçasına tutturup dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "En nihayetinde karşı karşıya geldiğimizde... Uğruna Commorragh'taki herkesi kesip biçmem gerekse bile geleceğiz, emin ol. Sen de karşı karşıya geldiğimizde orada olursan sakın ola son darbeyi indirmeyi aklından bile geçirme. Bir Aezyrraesh'in canını alma hakkı, yalnızca bir Aezyrraesh'e aittir. Bu hak bana ait."
languages.original_text: {n}With the claw of his glove, Marazhai hooks one of the crushed plates of armour on his thigh and examines it meticulously.{/n} "When we at last face each other — and we will face each other, even if I have to gut all of Commorragh to do it — and if you are there when it happens, do not even think of trying to deliver the final blow. Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh — and that right is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, eldivenindeki pençenin yardımıyla ezilen zırh plakalarından birini kalçasına tutturarak dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "En nihayetinde karşı karşıya geldiğimizde... Uğruna Commorragh'taki herkesi kesip biçmem gerekse bile geleceğiz, emin ol. Sen de karşı karşıya geldiğimizde orada olursan sakın ola ki son darbeyi indirmeyi aklından bile geçirme. Bir Aezyrraesh'in canını alma hakkı yalnızca bir Aezyrraesh'e aittir. Bu hak da bana ait."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
